entry.title: WIND WARNING, Medicine Hat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:16 a.m. MDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers beginning after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 90 overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 7:48 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High 12.
entry.summary: Showers ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:48 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 7:48 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
